name: luscious
description: A library of SASS mixins, functions, and variables to use in your front-end projects.
author: Yisrael Grimes <yisraelgrimes@gmail.com>

scripts.styles: yarn run lint && yarn run compile && yarn run autoprefixer
scripts.dev: yarn run styles && yarn run watch
scripts.compile:test: node-sass --include-path 'core' --include-path 'node_modules/modularscale-sass' --include-path 'node_modules/sass-true/sass' --quiet --source-comments --output-style expanded -o test/ test/test.sass && yarn run autoprefixer
scripts.styles:test: yarn run lint && yarn run compile:test
